comment.body:
> [bitzero](#comment_2_1PufAcDbwEorihqokqg6xXkGsf59fADXE2): It may sound harsh, but if pedos would start to post their links here, it would basically be a win-win situation: sickos have a place to share their crap, and decent people can inform themselves about the files and sites they have to stay way from.

You seem not to have heard of the "Streisand - effect", so-called...
